Introduction

Kang Hyunggu, known professionally as Kino, is a South Korean singer-songwriter and rapper. He is a member of PENTAGON and the founder of his independent label, NAKED.

Kino debuted with PENTAGON on October 10, 2016, with the mini-album PENTAGON. He later launched his solo career with the special single Pose on August 9, 2022.

On October 9, 2023, Cube Entertainment announced that Kino had ended his exclusive contract along with four other PENTAGON members. On December 15, 2023, MK Sports reported that he had established his own one-man record label, NAKED.
